latest.title: Trump and Leaders Across Political Spectrum React to Charlie Kirk Shooting
latest.summary: Some politicians called for prayers, while some others immediately cast blame.

archive.title: Michigan Judge Tosses Out Cases Against Fake Trump Electors
archive.summary: The judge, a Democrat, concluded that fake electors recruited to support Donald J. Trump’s candidacy in 2020 did not understand that they were being asked to do something illegal.

archive.title: Trump Says Having ‘a Little Fight With the Wife’ Should Not Count as a Crime
archive.summary: President Trump said that offenses that happen at home should not undermine his record of crime reduction in Washington.

archive.title: Trump Is Met With Mostly Boos at U.S. Open as Security Delays a Match
archive.summary: With the president in attendance at Arthur Ashe Stadium, the men’s final began as hundreds of people were still waiting to go through security screening.

archive.title: Grand Juries in D.C. Reject Wave of Charges Under Trump’s Crackdown
archive.summary: The persistent rejections suggest that the grand jurors may have had enough of prosecutors seeking harsh charges in a highly politicized environment.

archive.title: Second Weak Jobs Report Undercuts Trump’s Claims of a Booming Economy
archive.summary: After a bad employment report in August, President Trump fired the official in charge of the numbers. This month’s data was just as disappointing.

archive.title: Harvard Won Its Money Back, but Will It Actually Get It?
archive.summary: A judge ruled that the Trump administration broke the law in canceling billions in federal funds for Harvard. Whether the money is returned matters for the rest of higher education.

archive.summary: This is a placeholder. The GitHub Action will replace it with an actual top story once it runs.
